hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select distinct <#list properties as property> t.${property.propertyAccessorName} as ${property.name}, </#list> r.use_time as use_time from ${tableName} t inner join cd_recent_use r on t.${objectIdInItemProperty} = r.object_id_identity where r.user_id = :userId and r.module_id = :moduleId order by r.use_time desc
